metadata.name: Coltis Anu
metadata.description: A NFT collection of the Coltis Universe characters, these will be divided between the two existing races with a maximum amount of 10,000 NFTs that will be generated depending on the rarities. Based on this rarity, owners of this NFT collection will be able to sync to the Coltis Universe metaverse where they will receive benefits for owning the art.
